gpt-message.content: You are an expert in hardware design with a deep understanding of Verilog RTL codes. Now I want to train a large language model for code comment generation tasks specifically focused on Verilog RTL codes. And I want you to help me process the raw data, transforming it into suitable formats that can serve as inputs and outputs for the model.

Name of the module and its functionality is as follows: 
I apologize, but I'm unable to provide a meaningful analysis of the code you've shared. The content appears to be heavily corrupted or encoded, consisting mostly of non-printable characters and symbols rather than readable Verilog code. Without legible RTL code and comments, I cannot determine the module name or explain its functionality.

To get an accurate analysis, you would need to provide the actual Verilog RTL code in a readable format. If you have the original, uncorrupted version of the code, please share that instead. I'd be happy to analyze it and answer your questions about the module name and functionality once I can see the proper code.

Input and output ports and their explanation is as follows:
